profile:
The Home Improvement People have completed literally thousands of renovations since our inception. We are a unique award winning contracting company, consulted by various media as industry experts. 
Please view our website at homeimprovementpeople.com to view images of some of our projects. 
For our clients' convenience, we've implemented progress billing as well as financing.
Regardless of scope, we approach every single home renovation with a foundation of strong design aesthetics, comprehensive product options, sound project management, and a commitment to craftsmanship.
 
Our projects range from remodelled bathrooms and kitchens, to rear additions,  hardwood flooring, basements, second story additions and other extensive renovations. We undertake work in all budget ranges.
 
Choosing a reputable contractor is the most important decision you will make regarding your renovation. From plans and permits, to last little finishing details, The Home Improvement People is committed to completing your renovations and home improvements in a professional manner and to your complete satisfaction.
We take pride in our personalized service and our high quality workmanship. 
Call us for quality, insured work - completed on time, and on budget.
416-782-7605.

From custom homes to potlight installations and everything in between such as panels and service upgrades, Hotwire Electric-All can meet your electrical needs. We have build our reputation on quality workmanship and impeccable customer service. Coupled with personalized electrical design and advise to suit each individual client. At Hotwire Electric, our certified electricians are 110% committed to serving our clients with great service, honesty, and most important integrity. We offer a full spectrum of services for residential homes and commerical sites, from small projects to large. We strive to be efficient, neat and organized. We ensure our customers’ satisfaction from beginning to end. From basic electrical wiring to high-end lighting design, home automation and million dollar custom homes we insist on paying attention to detail and providing superior workmanship every step of the way. For us, no job is too big or too small Contact us for a quote today and see the Hotwire difference in your project! We offer our residential and commercial services 7 days a week. Contact us for your free estimate on your electrical projects. Hotwire Electric-All in is a fully insured and an authorized electrical contractor with the Electrical Safety Authority. Check out esasafe.com to view our listing. profile:
YOU DREAM IT - WE BUILD IT - 2 WEEKS - WE WILL BEAT ANY COMPETITORS WRITTEN PRICE QUOTATION BY A MINIMUM OF 5% - NO QUESTIONS ASKED - JUST CONTACT US

Finished Basement.ca, (ISM Renobuilders Inc.) is a family-owned and operated business. We specialize in basement renovations providing our customers with a finished basement that is professionally-built with high quality products and materials and finished with old-world craftsmanship, pride and attention to detail. 

Thinking about a Basement Renovation?

Finishedbasement.ca has been providing exceptional basement renovation services in the GTA since 1996. Converting people's dark damp basement's into clean, comfortable and fun living spaces.

We also offer unique, custom designs and consolations in interior decorating provided directly by the founder and owner, who personally oversees and manages all projects. 

Come visit our 3000sq. ft. showroom located in Mississauga. We have just recently added a new addition featuring: Limestone, Marble, Infrared Sauna's, Steam Shower Display and LED Lighting!!!!! 

Also offering in-house Audio Visual solutions by: Pure Custom Integrations. WHo help you understand tomorrows technology TODAY! Specializing in: Home Theatres, Home Automation, Home Integration....and more!

Unable to make it out to our showroom? No problem! Visit our website to explore more photos, video testimonials and our blog.


Thank you from the Finished Basement Crew for taking the time to check us out!

profile:
AGM Renovations experts provide quality basement and Bathroom Renovation services throughout the GTA and the surrounding area. See our Service Area for the complete list of towns where our  renovation services are offered. We offer 100% satisfaction guarantee on our workmanship and offer competitive prices with exceptional quality.

Expect more and when you need the best; trust AGM Renovations. We guarantee that you will be completely satisfied, which means that you don't pay until you are satisfied.
Our mission is to be committed to excel in the work we do. We are committed to excel and maintain a sense of pride in our all we do!

products: AGM Renovations, Basement finishing, Basement Renovations, Basement Reno, Finishing Basements, Basement Company, Finished Basements, Basement Expert, Finished Basements Company, Bathroom Renovations
services:
AGM Renovations offers Complete basement and Bathroom renovations packages from the professional design through the professional cleaning including:

Drywall- We employ only professional drywall installers and our goal is deliver complete satisfaction to each and every client with the quality of our workmanship and our prompt, reliable service.
    
Taping- Our drywall taping techniques will bring a high quality smooth finish, with a level of excellence you will take pride in.

Painting- We include all wall priming, painting of ceilings, baseboards, casing, crown and cove moldings into our basement construction packages
    
High Grade Laminate Flooring- is standard in our basement renovations packages.

Tiling- Shower, bathroom, or kitchenette tiling will be done by professional tile installers who are employed directly by AGM. A 2 year unlimited warranty is provided to you standard when you finish your basement with AGM
   
Plumbing- Our licensed plumbers will ensure that no problem is left unsolved and you can be sure that any drain or other plumbing defects left by the original house builder will be fixed effectively.

Electrical- We are committed to providing fully licensed electrician service as part of our standard package. Should you ever require an electrical certificate when you decide to sell your property, we will be happy to provide it to you

profile:
Welcome to ZAFCON INC your professional expert contractor. 

WHO WE ARE
Our company team consist of project managers, engineers, designers, construction and renovation specialists who are experts in their field. This team has worked successfully together to help our customers achieve their construction objective and dream renovations.

OUR CORE VALUES

Safety - We are commitment to safety to ensure everyone can return to their loved ones at the end of the day. As a result, we ensure all team members and all work is in compliance with safety regulations,  WSIB and Covid-19 protocols.

Quality - Quality distinguishes best from the rest. Our craftsmanship approach ensures that all of our clients receive nothing but the best quality service.

Integrity - We don't take the convenient approach but rather the RIGHT one, even if no one is watching.  

Transparency - The most important core value for us is to ensure our customers receive clear terms and conditions upfront. This will help us build long lasting relationships which further fosters our team culture across all levels of skills and management. 

Services we offer:

Full Home Renovations
Home Extensions and Upgrades
Basement Renovations
Kitchen & Bathroom Renovations

Check out our website for more pictures and to get an estimates on your next project or simply call us to discuss what is possible (647) 785-2929

 We are open for business and we are following all Covid-19 regulations.
name: ZAFCON INC

Our company “JJ home inspections and improvements” is based in Toronto and serving all the GTA. We are dedicated to serving our clients with quality and integrity. The team manager Jay Jahangiri is a civil engineering technologist and certified home inspector. Jay is also certified in “Radon Gas” measurement for homes and can provide mitigation methods. Our group has years of experience in all types of home improvements including interior and exterior of the houses.

profile:
Your Basement Design and Finishing Experts

At Bedrock Basements we are a team of design, construction and renovation professionals with decades of combined experience working together to provide a no-hassle one stop basement finishing solution.

If you have an unfinished basement we will start by understanding your needs for the space and design an appropriate layout that works for you within the structural constraints of your basement.

Adding value to your home and to your life is our mission. It’s something we live and breathe every day and incorporate into everything we do. From quality products and professional trades to thoughtful extras and warranties that make our clients feel at home.

profile:
Our job at High Class Renovation is to take your vision and make it a reality. We start by listening to your vision about your project and once we have a clear picture we begin to create the design for your renovation. Our goal is to ensure that everything is to your expectations. When it’s time to start your project, we go to work and complete the renovations just as we discussed, on time and within budget.

High Class Renovation is Barrie and surrounding Area’s leading home renovations service. We have 20 years of experience completing home and commercial renovation projects of all sizes. During that time of making our clients’ renovation visions a reality, we have worked in a variety of settings and installed hundreds of thousands of square feet of ceramic, porcelain and marble tile in custom houses, condos and new subdivisions.
name: High Class Renovations & Construction

profile:
During the past twenty years we are proud to be known as the most dependable, innovative and skilled contractors in the industry. 
We have a wide range of experience and expertise in Residential, Retail and Commercial accounts. 
This comes as a result of the structured focus of our team in building lasting and beneficial relationships with our clients. 
We invite you to browse through our website. Should there be any interest in receiving an estimate, do not hesitate to contact us.

Quality Assurance isn't just our name it's also one of our highest achievable priorities that we stand by. 
Successful control over our contracts has always been an important part of our philosophy. 
Our approach to maintaining high standards of workmanship and to assure customer satisfaction, our customer retention rate is a key factor to our business successes. 
Quality controls are maintained by doing regular quality check points with our clients.

We start with a detailed analysis of each contract, collecting all pertinent data needed for the preparation of a realistic service 
proposal. Our knowledge of the assessed account enables us to prepare both Scheduling and Quality Assurance.

Give A Call - 905-955-5248
